Title: Silverlight Media for DotNetNuke®
Description: SilverlightMedia is a module for DotNetNuke®. Its a container for showing Silverlight applications in a DotNetNuke® portal.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SilverlightMedia is a module for DotNetNuke®. Its a container for showing Silverlight applications in a DotNetNuke® portal.



This module make it easy to add a Silverlight application to a page in a DotNetNuke portal.

In this release you don't need the controll System.Web.Silverlight.dll

Now you can change the parameters Windowless, Background, Height, Width, InitParams, Version and Source.

Furthermore you can add your own messages if not the visitor have silverlight installed. The message can be translated.
